page.title: 09 TRANSPORT
page.content:
In the survey area{80%}of the residents were owners of cars although they purchased their petrol from several different surces. { 30%}used Public Transport on a regular basis,whereas the same percentage did so occasionally.The remaining{40%}did not do so because the fare was too expensive.
The present bus fare for the Llanferes-Mold journey is: { ADULT:RETURN-Â£1.45;SINGLE-Â£0.84 { CHILD:RETURN-Â£1.10;SINGLE-Â£0.56
The present taxi fare for the same journey is{Â£5.00. Only one resident uses a cycle.
